From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To display menu items single-spaced rather than double-spaced, use the **menu <menu-name> single-space**command in global configuration mode.

ParaDef.Info: Name of the menu this command should be applied to.

Examples: In the following example, single-spaced menu items are displayed for the menu named Access1:
ExtraInfo: When more than nine menu items are defined, the menu is displayed single-spaced. To configure the menus with nine or fewer items to display single-spaced, use this command.
